channel.title: Join the Project/Looking For A Team! [2 Source Dev. Spots Open!]
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]The Plan[/b][/size] [b][size=10pt]The plan is too build up an rsps server, and we currently have a decent project. So I have lots of work in progress before the server goes up for live demos! The world will much be build like great rsps servers today eventually, and this is why I want the live demo too be online when this happens, I am not looking for a major successful server, but I want to add what people actually want in the game to make the server somewhat popular! This will make the peoples in-Game experience alot much funner![/size][/b]
[size=12pt][b]The Team[/b][/size] [size=10pt][b]I am looking for a number of things, mainly: [size=10pt][b]-GFX Artist -Source Coder -Community Manager[/b][/size]
[size=10pt][b][i]Graphics Designers/GFX Artist[/i][/b][/size] [b]Creating banner for our rsps, will be used in toplist as well - Background - Icons for server, his own special created icon for his rank. You will also be responsible for taking screen shots of anything needed for forum posts. c:[/b]
[size=10pt][b][i]Source Dev's[/i][/b][/size] [b]You will be in charge of the source(duhh) and all its components.[/b]
[size=10pt][b][i]Community Manager[/i][/b][/size] [b]Must Have pass staff experience! [/b] [size=12pt][b]VPS/Website[/b][/size] [b][size=10pt]We currently have a VPS, it very decent, its components are: -4GB of Ram -120GB of Space -4 Cores -And About 1-2 TB Bandwidth
We currently have a free webhosting website, but eventually will be upgrading![/size][/b]
[size=12pt][b]Applying[/b][/size] [b][size=10pt]To apply just go ahead and add Me on skype and I will explain/ask questions. Skype: Melilshaw3[/size][/b]

item.title: Join the Project/Looking For A Team! [2 Source Dev. Spots Open!]
item.dc:creator: @li_drop_u_il li drop u il
item.description:
@li_drop_u_il wrote:

I’ve sended you an invite at skype, Accept it please.

King regards,
Jig Saw Ltd

Read full topic
item.source: Join the Project/Looking For A Team! [2 Source Dev. Spots Open!]

item.title: Join the Project/Looking For A Team! [2 Source Dev. Spots Open!]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Shaw Pure Shaw
item.description:
@Pure_Shaw wrote:

[size=12pt]The Plan[/size]
[size=10pt]The plan is too build up an rsps server, and we currently have a decent project. So I have lots of work in progress before the server goes up for live demos! The world will much be build like great rsps servers today eventually, and this is why I want the live demo too be online when this happens, I am not looking for a major successful server, but I want to add what people actually want in the game to make the server somewhat popular! This will make the peoples in-Game experience alot much funner![/size]

[size=12pt]The Team[/size]
[size=10pt][b]I am looking for a number of things, mainly:
[size=10pt]-GFX Artist
-Source Coder
-Community Manager[/size]

[size=10pt]Graphics Designers/GFX Artist[/size]
Creating banner for our rsps, will be used in toplist as well - Background - Icons for server, his own special created icon for his rank. You will also be responsible for taking screen shots of anything needed for forum posts. c:

[size=10pt]Source Dev’s[/size]
You will be in charge of the source(duhh) and all its components.

[size=10pt]Community Manager[/size]
Must Have pass staff experience!

[size=12pt]VPS/Website[/size]
[b][size=10pt]We currently have a VPS, it very decent, its components are:
-4GB of Ram
-120GB of Space
-4 Cores
-And About 1-2 TB Bandwidth

We currently have a free webhosting website, but eventually will be upgrading![/size][/b]

[size=12pt]Applying[/size]
[size=10pt]To apply just go ahead and add Me on skype and I will explain/ask questions.
Skype: Melilshaw3[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: Join the Project/Looking For A Team! [2 Source Dev. Spots Open!]
